## Loading and preprocessing the data
Unzip data to obtain a csv file.

```{r}
library("data.table")
library(ggplot2)
d <- fread('gunzip -cq activity.zip')
d$date <- as.Date(d$date)
sl <- d[, c(lapply(.SD, sum, na.rm = FALSE)), .SDcols = c("steps"), by = .(date)]
```
